# Companion Close API
<!--
@name: Companion Close API
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Close an API that was previously open
## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the channel with the API to close
